awards.text: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 1 win & 1 nomination.

fullplot: Success has James Brewster's name written all over it, and he also has his heart set on his boss's daughter. A con artist hires him to help out on a bank scheme, but then again, James will do anything to get rich and be the most successful businessman in Britian-even if it means murder!!!

title: Nothing But the Best
